title: Parasol Henbei
synopsis: All children dream to have a friend straight from a fairy tale... A little boy opens his closet and finds a strange creature with a parasol sitting in there. Nobody knows how he got there and from what mysterious worlds he is, but it is a fast friendship from the beginning. And nobody can ever know...
staff: [['Higuchi, Masakazu', ['Director']], ['Inoue, Osamu', ['Episode Director']], ['Mizutani, Takaya', ['Episode Director']], ['Fujiko, Fujio F.', ['Original Creator']]]
